subject: I'm gone...
msgSnippet: All, I ve unsubscribed, but keep getting the (hopefully) final few e-mails. If this gets through, so be it... I just can t seem to find a balance with this
messageBody:
All,

I've unsubscribed, but keep getting the (hopefully) final few e-mails. If
this gets through, so be it...

I just can't seem to find a balance with this list. I don't get the purpose
(if it isn't for junit development, I guess it is junit-users) and I
certainly can't find a way to progress the simple discussions. You can all
call me names & think I am throwing a tantrum, but do you not see the number
of distractions to content in these threads? I had one simple idea and I
have spent pages and page on it and progressed hardly one iota. Heck, J.B.
is asking me to explain yet again. I don't have it in me, I don't care that
much, the thought isn't worth this barrage.

I don't fit, and I don't feel like investing more effort trying. I was the
noise, and I have lots of things I'd like to spend my passion on where I
might fit. JUnit works good enough, so be it.

regards,

Adam
--
<http://www.try.sybase.com>
Experience Sybase Technology ...



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
